channel.title: SFM
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SFM, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Germany's second-largest lender Commerzbank to cut 3,900 jobs as it unveils new targets
item.description: Commerzbank announced it will eliminate 3,900 full-time positions by 2028, largely in its native Germany, as it unveiled a spate of new strategic targ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Sony raises full-year forecasts after solid PlayStation 5 sales in the holidays
item.description: The December quarter is a key period for Sony, covering the holiday shopping season which is often a lucrative time for consumer electronics firms.

item.title: Unilever sales just miss expectations; Ben & Jerry's ice cream unit heads for triple listing
item.description: Consumer goods giant Unilever posted slightly weaker-than-expected sales growth and pointed to a "slower start to 2025."

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Reddit shares plunge after Google algorithm change contributes to miss in user numbers
item.description: Reddit reported better-than-expected results, but the company issued disappointing user numbers.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Barclays shares sink 5% as fourth-quarter profit hike and 2025 guidance fail to impress
item.description: British bank Barclays posted a rise in full-year pre-tax profit that came in just ahead of analyst expectations, while also launching a £1 billion sha...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
